Module roborally
Package client.view

Class OnePlayerController

java.lang.Object
client.view.Controller
client.view.OnePlayerController
public class OnePlayerController
extends Controller
This class represents one small playerMat of one other player, it contains all necessary information the player needs to know about other players.
Author:
sarah, annika

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private javafx.scene.control.Label checkBoxLabel
    This Label shows the amount of checkPoints that the other player visited.
    private javafx.scene.image.ImageView currentCardImageView
    This ImageView shows the programming card the player plays in the current register
    private javafx.scene.control.Label displayingLabel
    This Label displays information that are only displayed for a short time, e.g. if the player got damage
    private javafx.scene.layout.HBox drawDamageHBox
    This HBox shows how much damage cards the player had to draw.
    private int energy
    This is the amount of energy of the player, initialized with 5.
    private javafx.scene.control.Label energyLabel
    This Label shows the amount of energyTokens that the other player has.
    private javafx.scene.control.Label infoLabel
    This Label displays information about if the player is current player, etc.
    private javafx.scene.control.Label nameLabel
    This Label displays the name of the other player.
    private javafx.scene.layout.HBox registerHBox
    This registerHBox shows which registers the player has already filled.
    private javafx.scene.image.ImageView robotIcon
    This ImageView displays the figure of the other player.

    The method sets if a player put a card in a register.

    This method shows the current card of the register that the player plays in the activation phase.
    void displayDamageCards​(java.util.ArrayList<CardType> damageCards)
    This method displays the images of the amount of damage cards for 5 seconds.
    private void fillRegister()
    This method fills 5 registers in an HBox with the same card image.
    void initialize()
    This method gets called automatically by creating the view, fills five registers with backside cards and sets elements of programming and activation phase invisible.

    This method resets the information related to the phases after one round.

    This method sets the text of infoLabel.

    This method sets the name, the occurring profile image and the 5 energy tokens when this other player gets added.

  • Field Details

    • nameLabel

      private javafx.scene.control.Label nameLabel
      This Label displays the name of the other player.

    • robotIcon

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView robotIcon
      This ImageView displays the figure of the other player.

    • infoLabel

      private javafx.scene.control.Label infoLabel
      This Label displays information about if the player is current player, etc. It is placed above the little playerMat

    • displayingLabel

      private javafx.scene.control.Label displayingLabel
      This Label displays information that are only displayed for a short time, e.g. if the player got damage

    • drawDamageHBox

      private javafx.scene.layout.HBox drawDamageHBox
      This HBox shows how much damage cards the player had to draw.

    • currentCardImageView

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView currentCardImageView
      This ImageView shows the programming card the player plays in the current register

    • registerHBox

      private javafx.scene.layout.HBox registerHBox
      This registerHBox shows which registers the player has already filled.

    • energyLabel

      private javafx.scene.control.Label energyLabel
      This Label shows the amount of energyTokens that the other player has.

    • checkBoxLabel

      private javafx.scene.control.Label checkBoxLabel
      This Label shows the amount of checkPoints that the other player visited.

    • energy

      private int energy
      This is the amount of energy of the player, initialized with 5.

  • Constructor Details

    • OnePlayerController

      public OnePlayerController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      This method gets called automatically by creating the view, fills five registers with backside cards and sets elements of programming and activation phase invisible.

    • setPlayerInformation

      public void setPlayerInformation​(Player otherPlayer)
      This method sets the name, the occurring profile image and the 5 energy tokens when this other player gets added.
      Parameters:
      otherPlayer - the player which gets added

    • fillRegister

      private void fillRegister()
      This method fills 5 registers in an HBox with the same card image.

    • currentCard

      public void currentCard​(CardType card)
      This method shows the current card of the register that the player plays in the activation phase.
      Parameters:
      card - programming card of the player in the current register

    • setDisplayingLabel

      public void setDisplayingLabel​(java.lang.String text)
      This method sets the text of infoLabel2 and displays it only for a short amount of time.
      Parameters:
      text - which gets added to the label

    • setInfoLabel

      public void setInfoLabel​(java.lang.String text)
      This method sets the text of infoLabel.
      Parameters:
      text - which gets added to the label

    • addCheckPoint

      public void addCheckPoint​(int number)
      This method sets the text of checkboxLabel to a number.
      Parameters:
      number - of last checkpoint the player reached

    • cardSelected

      public void cardSelected​(int registerSelected)
      The method sets if a player put a card in a register. It only displays which register is already filled, not which card.
      Parameters:
      registerSelected - the register where the player discarded a card

    • addEnergy

      public void addEnergy​(int energyCount)
      This method adds energy and displays this increase in the energyLabel.
      Parameters:
      energyCount - the amount of energy token that get added

    • setHBoxRegisterVisible

      public void setHBoxRegisterVisible​(boolean visible)
      This method sets the HBox of the registers visible or invisible.
      Parameters:
      visible - if the HBox should be visible

    • reset

      public void reset()
      This method resets the information related to the phases after one round. It sets everything related to programming phase. For this it fills the registers again and sets the imageView of activationPhase not visible the occurring HBox and sets the card.

    • displayDamageCards

      public void displayDamageCards​(java.util.ArrayList<CardType> damageCards)
      This method displays the images of the amount of damage cards for 5 seconds.
      Parameters:
      damageCards - this contains an array with CardTypes of damage cards
